DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, non-interventional, observational study to collect data on the use of botulinum toxin Type A in a routine setting in patients with upper limb adult spasticity.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study of BotoxÂ® Treatment for Patients With Upper Limb Adult Spasticity
DOC.criteria: Adult patients with upper limb spasticity following a stroke Eligible to receive botulinum toxin Type A No previous botulinum toxin Type A therapy
